insert into biz_add_fee(wms_id,operation_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, num, fees_no, fees_type,fees_type_name,fees_unit, item, is_calculated, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, calculate_time, write_time, adjust_num,remark, external_no,service_content,remark_content) values ( #{wmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adjustNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark}, #{externalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

insert into biz_add_fee(wms_id,operation_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, num, fees_no, fees_type,fees_type_name,fees_unit, item, is_calculated, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, calculate_time, write_time, adjust_num,remark, external_no, service_content,remark_content,pay_no,fixed_amount,first_subject,first_subject_name) values ( #{wmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adjustNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark}, #{externalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarkContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{firstSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstSubjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select pay_no payNo from biz_add_fee where pay_no=#{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update biz_add_fee a left JOIN fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no=b.fees_no set a.del_flag='4',b.del_flag='1' where a.del_flag='0' and b.del_flag='0' and a.create_time>=#{beginTime} and a.create_time<#{endTime} and a.customerid in
#{item}
